content.raw:
Cool, this works for me, the loading time went from 4.22404 to 1.39109. I also tried changing the `.tif` file and checked that the cached data is re-saved.

One suggestion would be to print that the data is being loaded from disk on the second run, and where it's being loaded from.
content.html:
Cool, this works for me, the loading time went from 4.22404 to 1.39109. I also tried changing the .tif file and checked that the cached data is re-saved.

One suggestion would be to print that the data is being loaded from disk on the second run, and where it's being loaded from.
